definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: cling, cleave, keep close (NH id., Ar. dabiqa Aram. [[דְּבֵק]], [[דְּבַק]] dbeq, dbaq)—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: lit. sq. [[בְּ]] Job 19:20 (bone to skin), so sq. [[לְ]] Ps 102:6; sq. [[אֶל]] 2Sa 23:10 (hand to sword; accidentally om. with other words 1Ch 11:13 cf. Dr 2Sa 23:11), Je 13:11 (girdle to loins), La 4:4 (tongue to roof of mouth, in thirst), so sq. [[לְ]] Job 29:10, Ps 137:6 (as a judgment); so also in metaph. Ps 44:26 [[דָּֽבְקָה לָאָרֶץ בִּטְנֵנוּ]] our belly cleaveth to the earth (‖[[שָׁחָה לֶעָפָר נַפְשֵׁנוּ]]), Ps 119:25 [[דָּֽבְקָה]] [[לֶעָפָר נַפְשִׁי]]; fish to scales of crocodile (fig. of Pharaoh), sq. [[בְּ]] Ez Eze 29:4 (but cf. supr.); abs. (recipr.) of folds of crocodile's belly Job 41:15; further of the [[חֵרֶם]] remaining in (sticking to) the hand sq. [[בְּ]] De 13:18; so of spot, stain Job 31:7;

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: so also of abiding on the land of one's tribe Nu 36:7, Nu 36:9 (sq. [[בְּ]]).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: = remain with, close to sq. [[עִם]] Ru 2:8, Ru 2:21 sq. [[בְּ]] v:Ru 2:23.
